verbs.description: The number of people [V: employed] [ARG0: by the cannabis industry] is set to triple to 630,000 by the year 2025 . The numbers seem poised for even more growth after President Trump signaled his approval of the industry .

The number of people employed by the cannabis industry [V: is] set to triple to 630,000 by the year 2025 . The numbers seem poised for even more growth after President Trump signaled his approval of the industry .
